aria-label.description: Adds an accessible name to the breadcrumb section. Required when the hasOverflowScroll prop is set to true.

children.description: Content rendered inside of the PageBreadcrumb (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes to apply to the PageBreadcrumb

hasBodyWrapper.description:
Flag indicating whether children passed to the component should be wrapped by a PageBody.
Set this to false in order to pass multiple, custom PageBody's as children.

hasOverflowScroll.description: Flag indicating if the PageBreadcrumb has a scrolling overflow

hasShadowBottom.description: Flag indicating if PageBreadcrumb should have a shadow at the bottom

hasShadowTop.description: Flag indicating if PageBreadcrumb should have a shadow at the top

isWidthLimited.description: Limits the width of the breadcrumb

stickyOnBreakpoint.description: Modifier indicating if the PageBreadcrumb is sticky to the top or bottom at various breakpoints
